 Set value of the argument.

Detailed Description

Command line argument with multiply values.

Arguments based on this class can be specified multiply times in command line and value for such arguments is a QList< QVariant >.

Member Function Documentation

int QtMultiArg::count (  )  const [inline]

Returns:
Count of defined arguments.

void QtMultiArg::checkConstraint (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Check corrcetness of the argument constraint.

Should throw QtArgContraintNotObservedEx if constraint didn't observed.

Reimplemented from QtArg.

QString QtMultiArg::getHelpString ( const NamesList &  namesList  )  const [inline, virtual]

Should return "HELP" string for this argument.

For spaces you have to use string constants from QtArgHelpPrinterIface interface.

Returns:
"HELP" string for this argument.
namesList Names of all available arguments.

int QtMultiArg::process ( QtArgCmdLineContext &  context  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Process argument.

Can throw exceptions.

Returns:
The number of processed arguments.

context  Command line context.
